name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
title: Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage
desc: ...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Cicin Mage

skills.name: Thundering Shield
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG, applies <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro Application to this character, creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Cicin Shield and prepares <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Surging Thunder.
